definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="104" w="318">if no energy vial is equipped, the menu must have been opened by right-clicking, so we give the player back their vial which was taken when the menu was opened.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="procedure_retval_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">PlayerHasEnergyVialEquipped</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:energy_vial_to_update</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
